actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To modify the navigation project for the Thames River, Connecticut to alter the dimensions of a turning basin in Norwich, Connecticut.

summary.text: Reconfigures the turning basin of the Thames River, Connecticut, navigation project in accordance with a specified alignment. Requires any required initial dredging of the widened portions of the basin to be accomplished at non-Federal expense. Deauthorizes the portions of the existing basin that are not included in the reconfigured basin.

titles.title: To modify the navigation project for the Thames River, Connecticut to alter the dimensions of a turning basin in Norwich, Connecticut.
